fields.auth_method_config: {"config":{"authentication-action":{ "mode":"" },"msg":"{% if config.authapi.auth_method == 'sms-otp' %}Your code is __CODE__{% else%}Authenticate at  __URL__ with __CODE__{% endif %}"{% if config.authapi.auth_method == 'user-and-password' or config.authapi.auth_method == 'email' %}, "subject":"Confirm your email" {% endif %}},"pipeline":{"register-pipeline":[{% if config.authapi.auth_method == 'sms' or config.authapi.auth_method == 'sms-otp' %}["check_whitelisted", {"field": "tlf"}], ["check_whitelisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_blacklisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_blacklisted", {"field": "tlf"}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 3600, "max": 10}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "tlf", "period": 3600, "max": 10}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 86400, "max": 50}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "tlf", "period": 86400, "max": 50}]{% else %}["check_whitelisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_blacklisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 3600, "max": 10}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 86400, "max": 50}]{% endif %}],"authenticate-pipeline":[] {% if config.authapi.auth_method == 'sms' or config.authapi.auth_method == 'sms-otp' %}, "resend-auth-pipeline": [ ["check_whitelisted", {"field": "tlf"}], ["check_whitelisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_blacklisted", {"field": "ip"}], ["check_blacklisted", {"field": "tlf"}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "tlf", "period": 3600, "max": 25}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "tlf", "period": 86400, "max": 100}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 3600, "max": 25}], ["check_total_max", {"field": "ip", "period": 86400, "max": 100}]]{% endif %},"give_perms":[{"object_type":"UserData","perms":["edit"],"object_id":"UserDataId"},{"object_type":"AuthEvent","perms":["create"]}]}}
